title: Wedding Bliss
caption: He and she — hearts joined under the mercy of Al-Raḥmān 🤍 In their eyes rests Sakīnah, and on their smiles, a whisper of Duʿā 🕊️

title: Family Joy
caption: Surrounded by love, guided by faith 🌸 Every heartbeat a reminder of the niʿmah of togetherness, every glance a prayer for Barakah 💫
